articles.author: Andrew McGlashan
articles.title: Questions for Australia: how many allrounders are too many in an ODI XI? - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: The visitors will use the upcoming three ODIs to find answers for the World Cup in India later this year
articles.content: Is there place for Marnus Labuschagne in Australia's ODI XI with Steven Smith at No. 3?  •  Getty Images
